import { useState } from 'react' import Button from '../shared/Button' interface StepsSectionProps { steps: { description: string; image: File | null }[] handleAddStep: () => void handleStepChange: (index: number, field: 'description', value: string) => void handleImageChange: (index: number, value: File | null) => void // 여기 수정 handleRemoveStep: (index: number) => void } function StepsSection({ steps, handleAddStep, handleStepChange, handleRemoveStep, handleImageChange, }: { steps: { description: string; image: File | null }[] handleAddStep: () => void handleStepChange: ( index: number, field: 'description' | 'image', value: string | File | null, ) => void handleRemoveStep: (index: number) => void }) { return (
{steps.map((step, index) => (
handleStepChange(index, 'description', e.target.value) } /> { const file = e.target.files?.[0] || null // 선택된 파일을 가져오거나 null handleImageChange(index, file) // 파일을 처리 }} />
))}
) } export default StepsSection
